title: Ethereum Game 'Nifty Island' Launches Speedrun Challenge—How to Earn NFTs
description: Nifty Island reveals "Break the Targets," a new challenge for creators and speedrunners alike to showcase their skills and earn rewards.

title: Bitmain Reveals S21 Pro Bitcoin Miner: Pioneering 15 Joules per Terahash
description: On Friday, the producer of bitcoin-specific application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) mining equipment, Bitmain, unveiled the latest Antminer S21 Pro model during the World Digital Mining Summit (WDMS). This new device features a hashrate of approximately 234 terahash per second (TH/s) and boasts a much lower energy efficiency of 15 joules per terahash (J/T). New Antminer […]

title: Massive USDC inflow to Coinbase boosts confidence in Bitcoin and Ethereum
description: Coinbase, an outstanding cryptocurrency exchange, received $1.4 billion, the USDC stablecoin backed by the USA dollars and Circle issued. This deal has kept the process of cryptocurrency currency brainstorming, as for the majority, it is considered a clear indication of investors’ readiness to invest their money in this domain of digital finance. Analysts now speculate […]

title: UK court freezes $7.6m of Craig Wright’s assets
description: A British court has issued a global freeze on $7.6 million of Craig Wright's assets, effectively blocking him from transferring the funds abroad.
